        public static void startServerInstance(java.io.File dataDir,
                       ServerCnxnFactory factory,
                       java.lang.String hostPort)

      • createNewServerInstance

        public static ServerCnxnFactory createNewServerInstance(ServerCnxnFactory factory,
                                        java.lang.String hostPort,
                                        int maxCnxns)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                                        java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method instantiates a new server. Starting of the server instance has been moved to a separate method startServerInstance(File, ServerCnxnFactory, String). Because any exception on starting the server would leave the server running and the caller would not be able to shutdown the instance. This may affect other test cases.
        Returns:
        newly created server instance
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        See Also:
        ZOOKEEPER-1852 for more information.
